name: MutantYearZero
description: MutantYearZero automates the rolling of Skill, Base (Stat), and Gear dice using Mutant: Year Zero dice mechanics.## Commands```!myz [Skill Roll] [Base Roll] [Gear Roll] [--<Label>|<Message> ...]```Performs a Mutant Year Zero Roll.* **[Skill Roll]** -- An inline dice expression rolling the d6s. 6s are counted as a success (â˜¢). Example: [[3d6]]* **[Base Roll]** -- An inline dice expression rolling the d6s. 6s are counted as a success (â˜¢). 1s are counted as Trama (â˜£). Example: [[4d6]]* **[Gear Roll]** -- An inline dice expression rolling the d6s (â˜¢). 1s are counted as Gear Degradation (ðŸ’¥). Example: [[2d6]]* **[--<Label>|<Message> ...]** -- An optional set of text to be shown above the die roll. Label may be omitted to just provid a text field. You can specify as many optional descriptions as you like.```!myz [[5d6]] [[3d6]] [[4d6]] --Player|Buzzard --Skill|Know the Zone (Wits)``````!wmyz [Skill Roll] [Base Roll] [Gear Roll]```Identical to !myz except that the results are whispered to the player rolling and the GM.### Configuration* **GM Can Push** -- determines if the GM is allowed to push a player' roll.* **Report Mode** -- determines when and how invalid push attempts arereported. Options are: `None`, `GM`, `GM & Player`, `Public`
